main event: A sighting of seven circular blue-white objects occurred on September 14, 1957, in San Antonio, Texas.
interesting points: Two of the objects were the size of a large pinhead while five were smaller., The objects drifted slowly in a westerly direction and faded out of sight after 5 minutes., The report suggests the possibility of the objects being balloons or aircraft., The visibility during the sighting was clear with no unusual objects reported on radar., The U.S. Weather Bureau noted a weather balloon was released at the same time as the sightings.
